name: Html5.validlite
body:
#Demo
[Click to demonstration](http://xenophon566.github.io/stuffs/html5.validLite/)

ValidLite
=========

#### Features
1. set validation patterns to data-* attributes.
2. set CSS3 styles to data-* attributes.

#### Base on
HTML5, CSS3

###Individual validations
`<input type="text" name="require" onBlur="validLite.getValidata(this);"/>`

###Overall validations
`<input type="button" value="Submit" onClick="validLite.getValidata();"/>`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
